mapper.select: select MOVIE_NO as movieNo, MOVIE_IMAGE_FILENAME as fileName from MOVIE_IMAGE where MOVIE_NO = #{value}

select MOVIE_NO as movieNo, MOVIE_TRAILER_URL_ADDRESS as movieTrailerURLAddress, MOVIE_TRAILER_TITLE as movieTrailerTitle, MOVIE_TRAILER_CREATED_DATE as movieTrailerCreatedDate from MOVIE_TRAILER where MOVIE_NO = #{value}
select genre_no as no, genre_name as name from genre where genre_name = #{value}
select director_no as no, director_name as name, director_name_en as nameEn from director where director_no = #{value}
select actor_no as no, actor_name as name, actor_name_en as nameEn from actor where actor_no = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into movie (movie_no, movie_title, movie_title_en, movie_rate, movie_runtime, movie_open_date, movie_summary, movie_producer) values (#{no}, #{title}, #{titleEn}, #{rate}, #{runtime}, #{openDate}, #{summary}, #{producer})
insert into actor (actor_no, actor_name, actor_name_en) values (#{no}, #{name}, #{nameEn})
insert into movie_actor (moive_no, actor_no, actor_priority) values (#{movieNo}, #{actorNo}, #{actorPriority})
insert into director (director_no, director_name, director_name_en) values (#{no}, #{name}, #{nameEn})
insert into movie_trailer (movie_no, movie_trailer_title, movie_trailer_url_address) values (#{movieNo}, #{title}, #{urlAddress})
